mapper.insert: insert into b_tax_refund (id, application_form_number, tax_refund_method, tax_refund_date, application_form_material, invoice_material) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRefundMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taxRefundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applicationFormMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update b_tax_refund set application_form_number = #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_refund_method = #{taxRefundMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tax_refund_date = #{taxRefundDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, application_form_material = #{applicationFormMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_material = #{invoiceMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, application_form_number, tax_refund_method, tax_refund_date, application_form_material, invoice_material from b_tax_refund
